Scattershot:


Scattershot walked into the Alliance lab, his energon blade in his right hand 
and on.  He walked over to Stalker's (Soundwave) body, and slashed once, the 
left arm falling to the ground.  He slashed again, the right arm hitting the 
ground.  He slashed in one long sweep, and cut off both legs.  

"Yeessssssssssssssssssssssssssss.  This body will do nicely for my 
supercalifragelisticexpealidocious (the scary thing is I think that's 
correctly spelled...)
plans!" he began cutting some more, only now around Stalker's torso.
